author: Retro Game Corps
description:
The abxylute 3D One is very unique: it has a glasses-free 3D display and with its 11" screen, it's an abxylute UNIT.  Let's see if it goes beyond gimmick.

More info: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/abxylute/abxylute-3d-one-worlds-first-glass-free-3d-pc-handheld/

ReShade: https://reshade.me/
OKest Gamer's video: https://youtu.be/VNZfINc8yFk

This was a review unit sent to me by the manufacturer.  All opinions are my own, they did not see this review ahead of time, and no money was exchanged in any way.

Ways to support this channel:
RGC merch: https://store.retrogamecorps.com
Stickers and magnets: https://www.ebay.com/str/retrogamecorpscharitystore

Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/retrogamecorps

title: The World's First 3D Handheld PC (sorta)
